程序包 utt.xjy_szy.lo02_projet.game

类 Person

java.lang.Object
utt.xjy_szy.lo02_projet.game.Person
所有已实现的接口:
Element, Scoring
直接已知子类:
Player, PlayerVirtuel
public abstract class Person
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scoring, Element
The class of Person, which implements Scoring and Element, Person is a concrete visitor The properties are: nom, totalScore, hand, victoryCard, deck and carpet
作者:
Jiayin XU, Zhengyang SU
另请参阅:
Deck, Card, Carpet
